body.p: This week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter has reports from the infrastructure teams, with the spring cleaning at the www.gentoo.org website and a summary of the recent reshuffle of moderators and admins at the Gentoo Forums. Developer SeJo from Belgium is this week's featured dev, the UK community is off to an early start preparing for the UK version of the Linux World Expo, and the press clippings reflect mostly cheerful Gentoo-related publications during the last week. Enjoy!
